actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize retention of certain reserve officers and to authorize the transfer of certain reserve officers from the Retired Reserve to active status.

summary.text: Permits the Secretary of the Army, with the officer's consent, to retain any reserve officer in an active status until such officer reaches the age of 60.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize retention of certain reserve officers and to authorize the transfer of certain reserve officers from the Retired Reserve to active status.
